title: Can not build godoc without root permission after go 1.2rc1
body:
1. export GOPATH=~/go
2. go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc


What is the expected output?

install the godoc on ~/go/bin

What do you see instead?

go install code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc: open /usr/lib/go/bin/godoc: permission
denied

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

Arch Linux 

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

+f4d1cb8d9a91 (go 1.2rc1)

Please provide any additional information below.
